segments.text: What's the Mountaineering Club doing this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are going to climb a cliff on the Yangtze River .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is a very difficult climb , because there are not many places to put your hands and feet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you do last week ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We rappelled down the side of a 300 - foot cliff . It's very exciting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow . That sounds like a lot of fun . I am sorry I missed it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you should come this weekend . I think you could do the climb .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I will . See you then !
segments.speaker: S1
